Package eu.eco2clouds.accounting.monitoringcollector

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Collector
    Used to generalise Collector use and facilitate testing.
    IDatabaseConnector
    Used to generalise database access and facilitate testing.
    Monitor
    Used to generalise Monitor use and facilitate testing.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractMonitoringCollector
    A base class that abstracts the threading code from any Monitoring Collector implementation.
    ConfigurationValues
    The Class ConfigurationValues.
    DatabaseConnector
    Connects to an external database and interacts via prepared SQL statements.
    Experiment
    Used to represent experiment database records.
    Item
    Used to represent metrics items as returned by the Zabbix abstraction API.
    MainDaemon  
    MainLauncher
    Wrapper class, the application entry point.
    MessageHandler
    Provides static functionality for printing timestamped messages for debugging and informative purposes.
    MetricsCollector
    Periodically gets the list of active ECO2Clouds resources from the accounting database and calls the BonFIRE Zabbix API abstraction for all metrics recorded for that experiment since the last query.
    MMQEvent
    Represents the object structure of a message queue event.
    MMQMonitor
    Monitors the BonFIRE Management Message Queue (MMQ) for ECO2Clouds experiment and compute resource events to know when to start and stop tracking a resource.
    MonitoringCollector
    A concrete implementation of an AbstractMonitoringCollector.
    PhysicalHost
    Used to represent (physical) host database records.
    Resource
    A general type which forms the basis for Virtual Machines, Experiments and other resources of an ECO2Clouds experiment.
    Site
    Used to represent site/testbed database records.
    VirtualMachine
    Used to represent virtual machine database records.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    DatabaseConnector.Mode
    The SQL dialects supported by the connector.
    MessageHandler.Level  
    MMQMonitor.Route
    The Enum Route.
